survey_name: Green Energy Home Installation Interest Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gauge homeowner interest in green energy solutions for residential properties, including solar panels, wind turbines, and energy-efficient appliances.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with green energy solutions for homes?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button scale to measure familiarity. Ensure options cover the full range of possible familiarity levels.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with green energy solutions for homes?

questions.question_text: Which of the following green energy solutions are you interested in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Ensure 'None of the above' is included as an option.

script.question_text: Which of the following green energy solutions are you interested in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason for your interest in green energy solutions?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents except those who selected 'None of the above' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use radio buttons. Include 'Other' as an option for unlisted reasons.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason for your interest in green energy solutions?
script.routing_logic: All respondents except those who selected 'None of the above' in Q2

questions.question_text: Please specify your 'Other' reason for interest in green energy solutions.
questions.client_notes: Open-text field for detailed responses. Ensure mobile-friendly input.

script.question_text: Please specify your 'Other' reason for interest in green energy solutions.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to install a green energy solution in your home within the next 3 years?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents except those who selected 'None of the above' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale with radio buttons to measure likelihood.

script.question_text: How likely are you to install a green energy solution in your home within the next 3 years?
script.routing_logic: All respondents except those who selected 'None of the above' in Q2

questions.question_text: What is the biggest barrier preventing you from installing green energy solutions in your home?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Somewhat unlikely' or 'Very unlikely' in Q5
questions.client_notes: Use radio buttons. Include 'Other' as an option for unlisted barriers.

script.question_text: What is the biggest barrier preventing you from installing green energy solutions in your home?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Somewhat unlikely' or 'Very unlikely' in Q5

questions.question_text: What type of home do you currently live in?
questions.client_notes: Use radio buttons. Include 'Other' for unlisted housing types.

script.question_text: What type of home do you currently live in?

questions.client_notes: Open-text field for detailed responses. Ensure mobile-friendly input.

questions.question_text: What is your approximate household income range?
questions.client_notes: Use radio buttons. Include a 'Prefer not to say' option for sensitive data.

script.question_text: What is your approximate household income range?

questions.question_text: How important are government incentives (e.g., tax credits, rebates) in your decision to adopt green energy solutions?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents except those who selected 'None of the above' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale with radio buttons to measure importance.

script.question_text: How important are government incentives (e.g., tax credits, rebates) in your decision to adopt green energy solutions?
script.routing_logic: All respondents except those who selected 'None of the above' in Q2
